com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.annotation
Annotation Type Entity

@Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface Entity

This annotation is used to indicate the persistence state of a model. A model can be marked as either persistent or transient using the PersistenceMode enumeration. Persistent models must include an empty constructor in order for the Infinitum ORM to work. For example: 

 public class Foobar {
        // ...
        public Foobar() {
        }
        // ...
 }

Since:
02/12/12
Version:
1.0
Author:
Tyler Treat

Optional Element Summary
 PersistencePolicy.Cascade cascade
          Indicates the entity's cascade mode.
 java.lang.String endpoint
          Returns the REST endpoint name for this entity.
 boolean lazy
          Indicates if the entity has lazy loading enabled.
 OrmConstants.PersistenceMode mode
          Returns the OrmConstants.PersistenceMode for this entity.
 

mode

public abstract OrmConstants.PersistenceMode mode
Returns the OrmConstants.PersistenceMode for this entity. The default mode is persistent.

Returns:
PersistenceMode
Default:
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.OrmConstants.PersistenceMode.Persistent

cascade

public abstract PersistencePolicy.Cascade cascade
Indicates the entity's cascade mode. PersistencePolicy.Cascade.All means that when the entity's state is changed in the database, all entities related to it will also be updated. PersistencePolicy.Cascade.None means that no related entities will be cascaded. PersistencePolicy.Cascade.Keys means that only foreign keys will be cascaded.

Returns:
true if cascading is enabled, false if not
Default:
com.clarionmedia.infinitum.orm.persistence.PersistencePolicy.Cascade.All

lazy

public abstract boolean lazy
Indicates if the entity has lazy loading enabled. If it is, related entities will be dynamically loaded when accessed.

Returns:
true if lazy loading is enabled, false if not
Default:
true

endpoint

public abstract java.lang.String endpoint
Returns the REST endpoint name for this entity.

Returns:
REST endpoint name
Default:
""
